doc.title: Andhaa Kanoon
doc.plot: Vijay Kumar Singh at a very young age witness the death of his father and sister. Three men name Amar, Akbar and Anthony was responsible for there death and he swears not to rest in piece until he takes revenge against these men. Later on he was successful in killing all three of them in different ways by framing it as accidents. And then he reach up with a man called Jan Nissar Akhtar Khan, years later Mr. Khan had a very happy family which consist of his wife Zakhiya Khan and small daughter. He earn his living by working as a forest officer. One day he caught some loggers cutting timbers and exporting them illegally when he try to confront them, one of them name Shri Ram Gupta try to bribe him but he refuses to accept a bribe. On refusing Mr. Gupta decides to frame him for murder and have him sentence to fourteen years of imprisonment, cannot bear the shock Mr. Khan's wife and daughter decides to commit suicide. On his release from jail he was instigated against Mr. Gupta and finds him alive and decides to kill him and have his revenge taken.
